name: CYBER REVOLT
description:
CYBER REVOLT

Set in a futuristic world ruled by Scorion, play as a descendant of the knight Lancelot a former seat holder at the round table, who uses his ancestral ties to fight his way through the hordes to halt the corruption Scorion is spreading throughout the world. While also getting as many points as you can on the way.

Our game is basically :

  • - A 2D “Run n Gun” platformer heavily inspired by classics such as Konami’s “Contra” and SNK’s “Metal Slug.”
  • - Thematically and aesthetically inspired by films such as Blade Runner and Ghost in the Shell.
  • - Medieval weapons with a modern twist.
  • - Fast Paced, Action packed.

CLASSES

Cyber Revolt offers a multitude of classes that create a constantly changing  game play as each set of armor drastically shifts the pace of the game and the players approach towards it, making it so that each play through will be different from the last.

DEFAULT 

A set of armor that our main character had built which gets the job done... albeit a lot slower and more difficult compared to other suits

RANGER

A modified hunters armor with long range capabilities and high damage output with its energy bow no target is too big or too small.

KNIGHT 

A set of armor rumored to have been the very same kit King Arthur wore into battle but cybernetically enhanced to suit futuristic combat. Heavy and can absorb a lot of damage and then release it.

LANCER

Scorion developed a rail gun, but the underground found it and this is the result. Equipped with a rifle that will absolutely decimate enemies that can also act as a lance that will pierce any foe.

JESTER

The unholy offspring of insanity and ingenuity, The jester armor is the berserker incarnate and will plow through enemies either with its shotgun or energy axe.
